description:
Launch your data science journey with Canonical’s Data Science Stack (DSS). This open-source environment (built on MicroK8s, JupyterLab, MLflow) offers a ready-to-run platform for machine learning on Ubuntu workstations.

The post Canonical Launches Data Science Stack for ML Beginners appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Canonical Launches Data Science Stack for ML Beginners

description:
Coming more than eight months after Tor Browser 13.0, the Tor Browser 13.5 release introduces an improved user experience of the fingerprinting protections by changing the visual design of the letterboxing implementation to avoid distracting users from the content they’re trying to view.

The post Tor Browser 13.5 Improves Fingerprinting Protections and Bridge Settings appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Tor Browser 13.5 Improves Fingerprinting Protections and Bridge Settings
